duties_responsibilities.duty: Take ownership of client audit projects and oversee them from start to finish.
Assume responsibility for assigned audits and collaborate with the audit team.
Assist in decision-making on accounting and auditing matters and elevate problems to senior management when necessary.
Develop advanced knowledge of accounting standards and common audit procedures.
Create a sense of team identity and promote cooperation within the audit team.
Clearly communicate technical issues to clients and team members.
Coordinate the accurate and timely completion of audits that meet client needs and follow professional standards.
Identify opportunities for process improvement and additional services.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Accounting (CPA or working toward CPA preferred)
